entry.title: DharamveerSinghGrewal/easy-docs: Easy-Docs is a lightweight and intuitive real-time collaborative text editor designed for seamless document creation and editing. Built with modern web technologies, it enables multiple users to collaborate simultaneously with live updates. Documents are securely stored in the cloud, ensuring accessibility and persistence across sessions.
entry.content: Easy-Docs is a lightweight and intuitive real-time collaborative text editor designed for seamless document creation and editing. Built with modern web technologies, it enables multiple users to collaborate simultaneously with live updates. Documents are securely stored in the cloud, ensuring accessibility and persistence across sessions.

entry.title: Gugulethu-Nyoni/formique: Formique is a lightweight, declarative JavaScript syntax library for generating WCAG accessibility and usability compliant forms.

entry.title: OpCodeWolf/rss-api-server: This RSS-API-Server is a Node.js-based API server built with TypeScript. It provides various endpoints for managing RSS feeds and user authentication, utilizing SQLite for data storage. The server is designed to be lightweight and efficient, making it suitable for integration with various applications.
entry.content: This RSS-API-Server is a Node.js-based API server built with TypeScript. It provides various endpoints for managing RSS feeds and user authentication, utilizing SQLite for data storage. The server is designed to be lightweight and efficient, making it suitable for integration with various applications.

entry.title: RyomenDev/google-oauth-kit: google-oauth-kit is a lightweight, easy-to-integrate microservice that provides seamless Google OAuth authentication for web applications. It allows quick implementation of Google login functionality, offering a secure, reusable solution for projects requiring user authentication through Google.
entry.content: google-oauth-kit is a lightweight, easy-to-integrate microservice that provides seamless Google OAuth authentication for web applications. It allows quick implementation of Google login functionality, offering a secure, reusable solution for projects requiring user authentication through Google.
